description: Ischgl, known as the "Ibiza of the Alps", is blamed for hundreds of cases among skiers across Europe.
title: Coronavirus: Ischgl resort at heart of Europe¡¯s outbreak reopens
title_page: Coronavirus: Ischgl resort at heart of Europe¡¯s outbreak reopens - BBC News
maintext: As a result, it is slowly easing restrictions. Small shops are already open again, and there are plans to open all shops by the beginning of May, followed by restaurants in the middle of the month.
